vlive.english: Today, I am trying to keep myself busy and warm by working hard on the show.

examples.korean: Keep moving - and get on with your life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 계속 움직이면서 생활을 해라. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Great warriors from the past, like Genghis Khan, used horses to move quickly and fight their enemies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 칭기스칸과 같은 과거의 훌륭한 전사들은 재빨리 움직이면서 적들과 싸우기 위해 말을 이용했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Great warriors from the past, like Genghis Khan, used horses to move quickly and fight their enemies. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Gliding across the ice to Scheherazade, she performed a program that featured six triple jumps and tacked a triple flip-triple toe loop combination. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 셰헤라자드에 맞추어 빙판 위를 미끄러지듯 움직이면서, 김연아는 6번의 프리플 점프를 선보였고 트리플 플립-트리플 토 루프 컴비네이션 점프를 추가했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Gliding across the ice to Scheherazade, she performed a program that featured six triple jumps and tacked a triple flip-triple toe loop combination. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Immersion Corp., out of San Jose, Calif., has developed a mouse that uses a tiny internal motor to simulate the sense of touch as you move your cursor across the computer screen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 산호세, 캘리포니아에서 나온 이머슨 사는 커서를 컴퓨터 스크린에서 움직이면서 촉감을 모방할 수 있는 내부에 작은 모터가 있는 새로운 마우스를 개발했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Immersion Corp., out of San Jose, Calif., has developed a mouse that uses a tiny internal motor to simulate the sense of touch as you move your cursor across the computer screen. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Since typhoons are formed over water, they move over the water gathering moisture, and dissipate when they hit land. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 태풍이 해상에서 형성되기 때문에, 이들은 물 위를 움직이면서 수분을 더 모으고, 땅에 닿으면 흩어진다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: Since typhoons are formed over water, they move over the water gathering moisture, and dissipate when they hit land. Add to Wordbook
